import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const onThisDayEvent={id:123,date:'April 9, 2011',title:'Messi scores his first El Clásico hat-trick',description:'On this day in 2011, Lionel Messi scored his first-ever hat-trick against Real Madrid in a thrilling 3-2 victory for Barcelona at the Santiago Bernabéu.',imageUrl:'/messi-hatrick.jpg',videoUrl:'/videos/messi-hatrick-2011.mp4'};const OnThisDay=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"on-this-day",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-title",children:["On This Day",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/history",className:"view-more",children:["See All ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faChevronRight})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"history-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"history-date",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCalendarAlt,className:"calendar-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:onThisDayEvent.date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"history-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"history-title",children:onThisDayEvent.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"history-description",children:onThisDayEvent.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"history-media",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"history-thumbnail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:onThisDayEvent.imageUrl||'/history-placeholder.jpg',alt:onThisDayEvent.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"play-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faPlay})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/history/${onThisDayEvent.id}`,className:"history-link",children:["View Full Story ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faChevronRight,className:"link-icon"})]})]})]});};export default OnThisDay;
